level.text: 820.1 In computing any period of time specified in this chapter, the day ofhe act, event, or default shall not be counted, and the last day of the periodhall be counted unless it is not a business day, in which event the time periodhall continue until the next business day. When the period of time prescribedr allowed is less than 11 days, intermediate Saturdays, Sundays, and legalolidays shall be excluded in the computation. “Legal holidays” shallnclude those holidays as defined in section 899 of Title 27.

820.2 Where the Department or a respondent to an action pursuant to thishapter has the right or is required to perform some act within a specifiederiod of time, and that act is completed by mail, three (3) days shall be addedo the prescribed period.
